sentences.en: It's a six-day immersive experience for the kids.
sentences.cn: 这六天对儿童来说是一个身临其境的体验。

sentences.en: This massive cascade of snow followed a six-day storm.
sentences.cn: 为期6天的风暴过后开始了这场大规模的雪崩。

sentences.en: Before that it was common to work six-day weeks with 12 to 14-hour days.
sentences.cn: 此前，人们通常是6天工作制，每天工作12到14小时。
